name: Michael Keaton
summary: Michael Keaton. Actor: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance). Quirky, inventive and handsome American actor Michael Keaton first achieved major fame with his door-busting performance as fast-talking ideas man Bill Blazejowski, alongside a nerdish morgue attendant (Henry Winkler), in Night Shift (1982). He played further comedic roles in Mr. Mom (1983), Johnny Dangerously (1984), and Beetlejuice (1988), earned further acclaim for his dramatic portrayal of Bruce Wayne / Batman...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar | 76 wins & 50 nominations total
